trans-unit.source: Implement to participate in the creation or choosing of a <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> object, especially to enable shared sessions.
trans-unit.target: 만들거나의 선택에 참여 하려면 구현은 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> 특히 세션을 사용 하면 공유 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Implement the IInstanceContextProvider interface to provide the appropriate <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> object to the system.
trans-unit.target: 적절 한 수 있도록 IInstanceContextProvider 인터페이스를 구현 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName>시스템 개체입니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this interface is implemented to support shared sessions, enable service instance pooling, control lifetimes of service instances, or to group contexts among clients.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로이 인터페이스는 서비스 인스턴스 풀링을 사용을 클라이언트 간에 컨텍스트를 그룹 또는 서비스 인스턴스의 수명을 제어 하거나, 공유 세션을 지원 하려면 구현 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, to implement sharing, insert a custom IInstanceContextProvider to decide which session or call from a client is associated with which <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 공유를 구현 하려면와 연결 된 어느 세션 또는 클라이언트에서 호출을 결정 하는 사용자 지정 IInstanceContextProvider 삽입 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>개체입니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: For an example that demonstrates the sharing of instance contexts, see [InstanceContextSharing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4a6a46d7-b7d7-4bb5-a0dd-03ffa3cbc230).
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스 컨텍스트 공유에 보여 주는 예제를 보려면 [InstanceContextSharing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4a6a46d7-b7d7-4bb5-a0dd-03ffa3cbc230)합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When an IInstanceContextProvider is inserted into [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], the normal property that controls the creation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> objects (the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property) is no longer checked and has no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 때 an IInstanceContextProvider에 삽입 됩니다 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]의 생성을 제어 하는 일반 속성 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>개체 (의 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성)은 더 이상 체크 영향을 주지 않습니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: A more generic mechanism by which you can initialize <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> objects when created (for example, to attach custom extensions to each <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>) is the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextInitializer?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 초기화할 수 있는 보다 일반적인 메커니즘 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>개체를 만들 때 (예: 각 사용자 지정 확장을 연결할 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>)은 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextInitializer?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextInitializer?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: Called when a new message is received.
trans-unit.target: 새 메시지를 받을 때 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The GetExistingInstanceContext method is called when a message is received.
trans-unit.target: GetExistingInstanceContext 메서드는 메시지를 받을 때 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Return the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object that you want to process the message, or `null`.
trans-unit.target: 반환 된 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>메시지를 처리 하려면 개체 또는 `null`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: In the case of `null`, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object for the message and then calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.InitializeInstanceContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 경우 `null`, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 새 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>메시지와 다음 호출에 대 한 개체는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.InitializeInstanceContext%2A>메서드.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.InitializeInstanceContext%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: If you return `null`, the new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object goes through the throttling system and increments the count of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle.MaxConcurrentInstances%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 반환 하는 경우 `null`, 새 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>개체가 스로틀 시스템을 통해 들어가고 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle.MaxConcurrentInstances%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle.MaxConcurrentInstances%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 의 수를 증가</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: The incoming message.
trans-unit.target: 들어오는 메시지입니다.

trans-unit.source: The channel that received the message.
trans-unit.target: 메시지를 받은 채널입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> object that is used to process the message; return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to instruct [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to create a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> 메시지를 처리 하는 데 사용 되는 반환 하는 개체 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 하도록 지시 하려면 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 새로 만들려면 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>개체입니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: Called when <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is returned from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext*> method.
trans-unit.target: 될 때 호출 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 에서 반환 되는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext*>메서드.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext*>

trans-unit.source: InitializeInstanceContext is called when <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext%2A> returns `null` and a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object is created.
trans-unit.target: InitializeInstanceContext 될 때 호출 됩니다 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext%2A>반환 `null` 와 새 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>개체가 만들어집니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called to notify you that a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> has been created.
trans-unit.target: 알려 주기 위해이 메서드는 호출 하는 새 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>만들어졌습니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The incoming message.
trans-unit.target: 들어오는 메시지입니다.

trans-unit.source: The channel that received the message.
trans-unit.target: 메시지를 받은 채널입니다.

trans-unit.source: Called when all <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> activities have completed to enable implementers to prevent the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> from being recycled.
trans-unit.target: 될 때 호출 모든 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>를 방지 하는 데 사용할 수 있도록 작업이 완료 되는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>재생.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: IsIdle is called when [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is about to close and recycle an idle <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object so that you can inform the runtime whether to continue doing so.
trans-unit.target: IsIdle 될 때 호출 됩니다 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 를 닫았다가 재활용할는 유휴 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>개체 런타임 테 작업을 계속할지 여부를 알릴 수 있도록</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> 하려고

trans-unit.source: For an example that demonstrates the sharing of instance contexts, see [InstanceContextSharing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4a6a46d7-b7d7-4bb5-a0dd-03ffa3cbc230).
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스 컨텍스트 공유에 보여 주는 예제를 보려면 [InstanceContextSharing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4a6a46d7-b7d7-4bb5-a0dd-03ffa3cbc230)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object that is considered idle.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>유휴 간주 되는 개체입니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is to close and recycle the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object and adjust the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle.MaxConcurrentInstances%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 를 닫은 다음 재활용 하는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>개체 및 값을 조정 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle.MaxConcurrentInstances%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle*> method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to enable implementers to provide a callback to notify [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object is finished.
trans-unit.target: 될 때 호출의 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle*>메서드가 반환 되 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 를 알리기 위해 콜백을 제공 하는 데 사용할 수 있도록 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 때는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>개체가 완료 합니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle*>

trans-unit.source: The NotifyIdle method is called when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A> method returns `false` to enable you to provide [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName> object that you use to inform the runtime that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> has finished its work.
trans-unit.target: NotifyIdle 메서드를 호출한 경우는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A>메서드가 반환 되 `false` 제공할 수 있도록 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 와 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName>런타임에 알리는 데 사용 하는 개체는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>해당 작업을 완료 했습니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName> object notifies the runtime that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> has finished its work, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A> once again.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName>개체 런타임에 알립니다 하는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>해당 작업을 완료 했습니다 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 호출 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A>다시 한 번.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This cycle continues until <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A> returns `true` and the context is closed and recycled.
trans-unit.target: 이 주기까지 계속 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A>반환 `true` 컨텍스트 닫았다가 재활용할 및.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback"></xref> object that notifies [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object is to be closed and recycled.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback"> </xref> 개체에 게 알려 주는 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 때는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>개체를 닫았다가 재활용할 하.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>.
trans-unit.target: 현재 <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>입니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>
